Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")]

[<System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")>]

summary.span: 提供在设计时编辑控件模板的服务。

span.span: Provides services for editing control templates at design time.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类已过时。The class is obsolete. 通过 控件设计器的属性公开模板。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 设计宿主 为 控件设计器中定义的每个创建一个对象。The design host creates a object for each in each that is defined for a control designer.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示服务是否支持嵌套模板编辑。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the service supports nested template editing.

value.span: 如果服务支持嵌套模板编辑，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类已过时。The class is obsolete. 通过 控件设计器的属性公开模板。Expose templates through the property of a control designer. 设计宿主 为 控件设计器中定义的每个创建一个对象。The design host creates a object for each in each that is defined for a control designer. 属性指示模板编辑器是否可从父模板编辑器的模板化控件的组件调用。The property indicates whether a template editor can be invoked from a component of a parent template editor's templated control. 这称为 "嵌套模板编辑"，因为模板编辑器是为模板编辑器已在运行的控件的组件调用的。This is called nested template editing, because a template editor is invoked for a component of a control for which a template editor is already operating.
